item.title: ‘We’re a fierce advocate and a wise friend’: Here’s what AARP’s new CEO will do for its 38 million members.
item.description: Social Security, caregiving, health and advocacy are at the top of her list.

item.title: Druckenmiller poured into regional banks in the third quarter
item.description: Stanley Druckenmiller made a big bet on regional banks in the third quarter, that’s likely paid off after a Republican sweep in the elections.
